docs.text: TacticalGaming.net ARMA Division Loadouts ARMA Division loadouts can be imported by copying a given script and clicking Import in the Arma 3 Virtual Arsenal. You can find these scripts by clicking your Squad's name on the left sidebar. Watch the following video for an example (instead of downloading text files, simply click the copy button on this site):
docs.title: TacticalGaming.net ARMA Division Loadouts

docs.text: ARMA Division loadouts can be imported by copying a given script and clicking Import in the Arma 3 Virtual Arsenal. You can find these scripts by clicking your Squad's name on the left sidebar. Watch the following video for an example (instead of downloading text files, simply click the copy button on this site):
docs.title: TacticalGaming.net ARMA Division Loadouts

docs.text: Echo 1-2 Loadouts How To Import To import loadouts, follow these steps: Start Arma 3. Enter the Virtual Arsenal by clicking Tutorials and then Virtual Arsenal from the main menu. Return to this site, click the drop-down of the loadout you want to import below, and click the icon in the top-right to copy the loadout's script. Re-open the game and click Import on the bottom of your screen to import the loadout from the copied script. Click Save on the bottom of your screen and enter the name of the loadout to save it. Repeat steps 3 to 5 for each loadout. docs.title: Echo 1-2

docs.text: To import loadouts, follow these steps: Start Arma 3. Enter the Virtual Arsenal by clicking Tutorials and then Virtual Arsenal from the main menu. Return to this site, click the drop-down of the loadout you want to import below, and click the icon in the top-right to copy the loadout's script. Re-open the game and click Import on the bottom of your screen to import the loadout from the copied script. Click Save on the bottom of your screen and enter the name of the loadout to save it. Repeat steps 3 to 5 for each loadout.
docs.title: How To Import
